title: The Pinhead Pierre Show
description: They don’t make them like this anymore. Pinhead Pierre has the smallest head of which I’m aware! It’s about the size and shape of a pear. Everywhere the children stare. Life’s cruel and unfair!
quote: No more pointing and laughing, kids!
altHero: Pinhead Pierre, a man in a brightly colored suit, with a very small, bald head
alt1: Pinhead Pierre in his living room set
alt2: Pinhead Pierre holding a pear that has his eyes, nose and mustache
alt3: Pinhead Pierre walking down a path with a group of little kids
alt4: Pinhead Pierre flying on a magic carpet
